oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Hai-||umm resemble the !kun. They speak the same language as the Berg Damaras and also speak !kun and the !kun understand their language. The Hai-||umm's country is near that of the !kun. The !kun buy something called sa from them. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hai ||umm
